name: Mondrain Squares - 2
description: Mondrain Squares again, but this time it is made to be generated in different sizes

name: Mondrain Squares - 3
description: Played around with rotating the squares and removing the stroke, made it look completely different but still keeping the same style.

name: Arctic Monkeys 'AM' animated
description: Inspired by Arctic Monkeys 'AM' album, however the lines are animated. I made it as I really like their music and I always imagined that their album cover would be animated, had it not been a still image.

name: AM variation #2
description: Thought of the arctic monkeys album but in the context of the mondrain squares, taking the original idea and amplifying it.

name: Rainy Day
description: Inspired by 'Rain' by Ilker Danalov, which is an acrylic painting.

name: Sandy Day
description: Inspired by 'Rain' by Ilker Danalov, however I also drew inspiration from the 'Desert Levels' in the popular video game 'New Super Mario Bros Wii'.
